trial_type.Description: Indicates whether a trial showed a THINGS image (exp), a repeated test image (test), or a catch image (catch)

file_path.Description: Gives path to image file in the THINGS database (e.g. /dog/dog_12s.jpg)

things_category_nr.Description: Index of category in the THINGS database (1-1854)

things_exemplar_nr.Description: Index for the exemplar of a given category in the THINGS database (1-12)

test_image_nr.Description: index of test image (1-100). Is <NULL> for non-test images
